card.name: ET:PC23028 TTCN 9939 - EoCN Fee modifier - No offers in use
card.description:
​A copy of 9926 (https://mingle.epk.ericsson.se/projects/classic_sdp/cards/4218) in CAPv3 and intermediate interrogation
  • Req_PC:23028-010 - New modifier in Rating structure
  • Req_PC:23028-020 - Deduct "EoCN Fee" from Main Balance or Monetary DAs
  • Req_PC:23028-030 - Deduct EoCN Fee only at the end of call
  • Req_PC:23028-050 - New field (as a condition) in USSD structure for result of “EOCN Fee” deduction
  • Req_PC:23028-060 - Apply price factor on the “EoCN Fee”, as in standard with “Fee”
  • Req_PC:23028-070 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing CCR parameters
  • Req_PC:23028-080 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in new CCR parameter
  • Req_PC:23028-90 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing macros in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-100 - Provide "EoCN Fee" information in a new field (or macro) in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-110 - This PC to work atleast for CAP v2, CAP v3, SCAP v2 calls ( 1/3)
  • GENERIC-001 - A normal PC-key for activation / deactivation of the PCR’s function is what is requested

PC License key activated.

Rating tree

  • Custom Price factor declared (50%)
  • Price 1 PLN  / sek
  • Modifier with  EoCN Fee (Fee= -40 PLN)

USSD tree

  • Field eocnFeeDeducted used in condition
    • New macro “eocnFee” used in message for condition evaluated to true
    • Macro $cost used in message for condition evaluated to false

Subscriber:

  • MA balance= 100
  •  DA balance= 20                                                                                                                                       

Perform call with cost 90 and verify  that EoCN Fee (20)  was added to DA

Verify messages and cdr/ccr.

card.name: ET:PC23028 TTCN 9938 - EoCN Fee modifier - parallel reservation
card.description:
​A copy of 9925 (https://mingle.epk.ericsson.se/projects/classic_sdp/cards/4219) in CAPv3 context with intermediate interrogation
  • Req_PC:23028-010 - New modifier in Rating structure
  • Req_PC:23028-020 - Deduct "EoCN Fee" from Main Balance or Monetary DAs
  • Req_PC:23028-030 - Deduct EoCN Fee only at the end of call
  • Req_PC:23028-050 - New field (as a condition) in USSD structure for result of “EOCN Fee” deduction
  • Req_PC:23028-060 - Apply price factor on the “EoCN Fee”, as in standard with “Fee”
  • Req_PC:23028-070 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing CCR parameters
  • Req_PC:23028-080 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in new CCR parameter
  • Req_PC:23028-90 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing macros in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-100 - Provide "EoCN Fee" information in a new field (or macro) in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-110 - This PC to work atleast for CAP v2, CAP v3, SCAP v2 calls ( 1/3)
  • GENERIC-001 - A normal PC-key for activation / deactivation of the PCR’s function is what is requested

PC License key activated.

Rating tree

  • Custom Price factor declared (50%)
  • Price 1 PLN  / sek
  • Modifier with negative  EoCN Fee (Fee= -40 PLN)

DA selection tree

  • Offer with DA selected for rating

USSD tree

  • Field eocnFeeDeducted used in condition
    • New macro “eocnFee” used in message for condition evaluated to true
    • Macro $cost used in message for condition evaluated to false

Subscriber:

  • MA balance= 100

 Offer  with DA balance= 20                                                                                                                                       

Perform call with cost 90 and verify  that EoCN Fee (20)  was added to DA

Verify messages and cdr/ccr.

card.name: ET:PC23028 TTCN 9935 - EoCN Fee modifier - no fee deducted for usu=0
card.description:
​A copy of 9921 (https://mingle.epk.ericsson.se/projects/classic_sdp/cards/4177) in CAPv3 context with intermediate interrogation
  • Req_PC:23028-010 - New modifier in Rating structure
  • Req_PC:23028-020 - Deduct "EoCN Fee" from Main Balance or Monetary DAs
  • Req_PC:23028-030 - Deduct EoCN Fee only at the end of call
  • Req_PC:23028-040 - Slogan Support for Fee Field in new modifier
  • Req_PC:23028-050 - New field (as a condition) in USSD structure for result of “EOCN Fee” deduction
  • Req_PC:23028-90 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing macros in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-100 - Provide "EoCN Fee" information in a new field (or macro) in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-110 - This PC to work at least for CAP v2, CAP v3, SCAP v2 calls ( 1/3)
  • GENERIC-001 - A normal PC-key for activation / deactivation of the PCR’s function is what is requested

 

PC License key activated.

Rating tree

  • Price 1 PLN  / sek
  • Modifier EoCN Fee (Fee=40 PLN) (offer attribute used)

DA selection tree

  • Product with DA selected for rating

USSD tree

  • Field eocnFeeDeducted used in condition
    • New macro “eocnFee” used in message for condition evaluated to true
    • Macro $cost used in message for condition evaluated to false

Subscriber:

  • MA balance= 20
  •  Product private  DA with total balance=100

Perform call with USU=0 and verify that no EoCN Fee was deducted

card.name: ET:PC23028 TTCN 9937 - EoCN Fee modifier in Rating Template
card.description:
A copy of 9924 (https://mingle.epk.ericsson.se/projects/classic_sdp/cards/4179) in CAPv3 and intermediate interrogation

  • Req_PC:23028-010 - New modifier in Rating structure
  • Req_PC:23028-020 - Deduct "EoCN Fee" from Main Balance or Monetary DAs
  • Req_PC:23028-030 - Deduct EoCN Fee only at the end of call
  • Req_PC:23028-040 -  Support for Fee Field in new modifier
  • Req_PC:23028-050 - New field (as a condition) in USSD structure for result of “EOCN Fee” deduction
  • Req_PC:23028-90 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing macros in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-100 - Provide "EoCN Fee" information in a new field (or macro) in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-110 - This PC to work at least for CAP v2, CAP v3, SCAP v2 calls ( 1/3)
  • Req_PC:23028-F010 - Support for new modifier in Rating template structure
  • GENERIC-001 - A normal PC-key for activation / deactivation of the PCR’s function is what is requested

 

PC License key activated.

Rating template  

  • Price 1 PLN  / sek
  • Modifier EoCN Fee (Fee=40 PLN) (template tree parameter used)

DA selection tree

  • Product with DA selected for rating

USSD tree

  • Field eocnFeeDeducted used in condition
    • New macro “eocnFee” used in message for condition evaluated to true
    • Macro $cost used in message for condition evaluated to false

Subscriber:

  • MA balance= 100
  • Product private  DA with total balance=100

Perform call with cost 90 and verify that EoCN Fee was deducted from DA+MA

card.name: Charge for End of Call Notification
card.description:
Description

When this EPIC is done, SDP will be able to charge for End of Call Notifications.

EPIC is spanned across the following team(s):

 

{{ table query: SELECT DISTINCT Team WHERE Type = Sprint AND Name In (SELECT Sprint Where Type = 'User Story' AND Epic = THIS CARD) }}

 

Related User Stories

 

{{ table query: SELECT number, name, 'Status - US', 'Story Points', 'Assigned Team', 'Progress % of US' WHERE Type = 'User Story' AND EPIC = THIS CARD }}

 

Burnup - Completed US Story Points

(Not counting Story Points in Preliminary & Discarded status)

 

{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.'Start Date' end-date: THIS CARD.'End Date' chart-conditions: type = 'User Story' AND 'EPIC' = THIS CARD AND 'Status - US' != Discarded AND 'Status - US' != Preliminary x-labels-step: 7 scope-series: Total US Story Points completion-series: Done US Story Points chart-height: 310 chart-width: 600 series: - data: SELECT SUM ('Story Points') WHERE 'Status - US' = 'Done' label: Done US Story Points color: green - data: SELECT SUM ('Story Points') label: Total US Story Points color: blue }}  

 

Important Dates

Code Freeze Date:
{{ value query: SELECT 'Code Freeze Date' WHERE Type = 'Business Sub Use Case' AND Name In (SELECT 'Business Sub Use Case' Where Type = 'Epic' AND NAme = THIS CARD.Name) }}
Planned Target Drop:
{{ value query: SELECT 'Planned Target Drop' WHERE Type = 'Business Sub Use Case' AND Name In (SELECT 'Business Sub Use Case' Where Type = 'Epic' AND NAme = THIS CARD.Name) }}

property.name: Moved to CR Alert OK on

card.name: SDP-PC23028 SDP should charge a new “EoCN Fee” to the subscriber, at the end of call/event
card.description:
User Story

As an operator

I want to implement the differential charging based on location of served-party when Nokia HSS based subscriber initiate a call using USSD call-back over ETSI MAP.

Description

Additional information, if needed

Constraints

Add constraints to the user story

Scenario

Describe the scenario(s)

Additional Information in documents

Link to other documentation

Related Engineering Tasks

 

{{ table query: SELECT number, name, 'Estimated Hours' ,'Remaining hours' , 'Actual hours', 'Status - ET', Sprint WHERE type='ET' AND ('User Story' = THIS CARD OR 'Requirement Tree - User Story' = THIS CARD) ORDER BY 'Status - ET' }}

 

 

Important Dates

Code Freeze Date:
{{ value query: SELECT 'Code Freeze Date' WHERE Type = 'Business Sub Use Case' AND Name In (SELECT 'Business Sub Use Case' Where Type = 'User Story' AND NAme = THIS CARD.Name) }}
Planned Target Drop:
{{ value query: SELECT 'Planned Target Drop' WHERE Type = 'Business Sub Use Case' AND Name In (SELECT 'Business Sub Use Case' Where Type = 'User Story' AND NAme = THIS CARD.Name) }}

card.name: SDP - PC:23028
card.description:
Progress % of the BSUC:

{{ value query: SELECT 'Progress % of BSUC' WHERE type = THIS CARD.type AND name = THIS CARD.name }}
 


Description

SP: https://erilink.ericsson.se/eridoc/erl/objectId/09004cff8d620817?docno=1597-FCP116338/23028Uen&action=current&format=msw12

Implementation Description:

PO/FL: Varun Chopra EVARUCH

SM: Avanish Kumar EAVAKUM

Design teams: SDP Team PL2

CPI Contact: Yukti Tuli

Engineering Tasks:

Branch: depends on TR

Eridoc folder link: N/A

 

Test results

 

EPICs connected to BSUC

 

{{ table query: SELECT number, name, 'Status - EPIC', 'EPIC Points', 'Assigned Team', 'Progress % of EPIC', 'Total ET estimated hours (on EPIC)', 'Total ET remaining hours (on EPIC)' WHERE Type = 'Epic' AND 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD order by Project_Card_Rank }}


Note: Do not modify or remove any of the reports

 

 

Status report

ET Overall status
{{ stack-bar-chart conditions: type = ET and 'Status - ET' != 'Discarded' and 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD cumulative: false labels: SELECT DISTINCT 'ET Category' series: - data: SELECT 'ET Category', count(*) label: Total color: #FF0000 combine: total - data: SELECT 'ET Category', count(*) WHERE 'Status - ET' = 'Done' label: Done color: #08e600 combine: overlay-bottom }}
Displays number of defined ETs per category and how many are done.
**********************************************************************************
{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Start end-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish chart-conditions: type = ET x-labels-step: 14 chart-height: 460 chart-width: 560 plot-height: 360 plot-width: 380 series: - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded label: Remaining hours color: #00ff00 - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded label: Estimated hours color: #ff0000 - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') WHERE 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD label: Actual hours* color: #0000ff }}


* Actual hours includes hours spent on Discarded ET:s. The Estimated and Remaining hours does not include Discarded ET:s

Status report in hours

Sum of all ETs

{{ table query: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours'), SUM('Remaining hours'), SUM('Actual hours') WHERE Type = ET and 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD and 'Status - ET' != Discarded }}

 

Sum of all ETs per category

{{ table query: SELECT 'ET Category', SUM('Estimated hours'), SUM('Remaining hours'), SUM('Actual hours') WHERE Type = ET and 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD and 'Status - ET' != Discarded GROUP BY 'ET Category' }}

 

Sum of all ET:s per status

{{ table query: SELECT 'Status - ET', SUM('Estimated hours'), SUM('Remaining hours'), SUM('Actual hours') WHERE Type = ET and 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD GROUP BY 'Status - ET' }}

*************************************************************************************

Unplanned tasks over time

{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Start end-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish chart-conditions: type = ET x-labels-step: 14 chart-height: 460 chart-width: 560 plot-height: 360 plot-width: 380 series: - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND Origin = Unplanned AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded label: Remaining hours color: #00ff00 - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND Origin = Unplanned AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded label: Estimated hours color: #ff0000 - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') WHERE 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND Origin = Unplanned label: Actual hours* color: #0000ff }}


 

 

 

 

Remaining Hours - TaskType

{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Start end-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish chart-conditions: type = 'ET' AND 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded y-title: Remaining Hours x-labels-step: 14 chart-height: 720 chart-width: 800 plot-height: 620 plot-width: 640 legend-max-width: 220 today-line: color: Aquamarine label: Today series: - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE type = 'ET' label: All color: red - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Doc label: Doc color: yellow - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Dev label: Dev color: blue - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= TestDev label: TestDev color: green - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Test label: Test color: black - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= DocInput label: DocInput color: purple - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Analyzis label: Analyzis color: maroon - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Other label: Other color: teal - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Qa label: Qa color: indigo - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') ideal-burn-down-line: color: coral label: Ideal }}

 

Remaining Hours - Status

{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Start end-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish chart-conditions: type = 'ET' AND 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded y-title: Remaining Hours x-labels-step: 14 chart-height: 720 chart-width: 800 plot-height: 620 plot-width: 640 legend-max-width: 220 today-line: color: Aquamarine label: Today series: - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE type = 'ET' label: Remaining color: red - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Backlog label: Not started color: blue - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET'= Ongoing label: Ongoing color: green - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET'= Review label: In Review color: teal - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') ideal-burn-down-line: color: coral label: Ideal }}


Estimated Hours

{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Start end-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish chart-conditions: type = 'ET' AND 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded y-title: Estimated hours x-labels-step: 14 chart-height: 720 chart-width: 800 plot-height: 620 plot-width: 640 legend-max-width: 220 today-line: color: Aquamarine label: Today series: - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE type = 'ET' label: All color: red - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Dev label: Dev color: blue - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= TestDev label: TestDev color: green - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Test label: Test color: black - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= DocInput label: DocInput color: purple - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Doc label: Doc color: yellow - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Analyzis label: Analyzis color: maroon - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Other label: Other color: teal - data: SELECT SUM('Estimated hours') WHERE 'ET Category'= Qa label: Qa color: indigo }}

 

Actual hours

{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Start end-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish chart-conditions: type = 'ET' AND 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND 'Status - ET' != Discarded y-title: ActualHours x-labels-step: 14 chart-height: 720 chart-width: 800 plot-height: 620 plot-width: 640 legend-max-width: 220 today-line: color: Aquamarine label: Today series: - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') WHERE type = 'ET' label: TotalActual hours color: red - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Backlog label: Not started color: blue - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') WHERE 'Status - ET'= Ongoing label: Ongoing color: green - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') WHERE 'Status - ET'= Review label: In Review color: teal - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') WHERE 'Status - ET'= Done label: Done color: yellow - data: SELECT SUM('Actual hours') ideal-burn-down-line: color: coral label: Ideal }}


Another remaining hours

{{ daily-history-chart start-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Start end-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish chart-conditions: 'Business Sub Use Case' = THIS CARD AND Type = ET y-title: Remaining hours x-labels-step: 14 chart-height: 720 chart-width: 800 plot-height: 620 plot-width: 640 legend-max-width: 220 scope-series: all completion-series: all target-release-date: THIS CARD.Planned product Finish series: - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') label: all color: black line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Ongoing label: Ongoing color: blue line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = 'On hold' label: 'On hold' color: red line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = 'Done' label: Done color: green line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Preliminary label: Preliminary color: yellow line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Backlog label: Backlog color: orange line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Planned label: Planned color: grey line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Review label: Review color: magenta line-width: 1 - data: SELECT SUM('Remaining hours') WHERE 'Status - ET' = Discarded label: Discarded color: indigo line-width: 1 }}

card.name: ET:PC23028 TTCN test 9928

  • Req_PC:23028-010 - New modifier in Rating structure
  • Req_PC:23028-020 - Deduct "EoCN Fee" from Main Balance or Monetary DAs

  • Req_PC:23028-050 - New field (as a condition) in USSD structure for result of “EOCN Fee” deduction
  • Req_PC:23028-070 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing CCR parameters
  • Req_PC:23028-080 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in new CCR parameter
  • Req_PC:23028-90 - Include the "EoCN Fee" information in existing macros in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-100 - Provide "EoCN Fee" information in a new field (or macro) in USSD structure
  • Req_PC:23028-110 - This PC to work atleast for CAP v2, CAP v3, SCAP v2 calls ( 1/3)
  • GENERIC-001 - A normal PC-key for activation / deactivation of the PCR’s function is what is requested

PC License key activated.

Rating tree

  • Price 1 PLN  / sek
  • Modifier EoCN Fee (Fee=40 PLN)

DA selection tree

  • Offer with DA selected for rating

USSD tree

  • Field eocnFeeDeducted used in condition
    • New macro “eocnFee” used in message for condition evaluated to true
    • Macro $cost used in message for condition evaluated to false

Subscriber:

  • MA balance= 100
  •  Offer  with DA balance= 20

Perform call with cost 90 and verify that no EoCN Fee was deducted

Provision new DA for Subscriber with balance = 40

Perform call with cost 30 and verify that EoCN Fee was deducted from DA + MA

Verify messages and cdr/ccr.
